content: back of the body on the bottom and single_crochet 4 single_crochet in one spot fasten the thread and hide it inside the part crochet design by vikgoldfish 2020 bunny for doll bunny for doll bring the threads from all pieces to the center sew on legs arms and ears so that they dangle on the threads if you want the handles to turn then the thread must be inserted and withdrawn into the body at the same point crochet design by vikgoldfish 2020 bunny for doll bunny for doll enjoy crocheting crochet design by vikgoldfish 2020
